name: Ambient Icons
description: Syncs the color of your icons with the level.

change-p1-extra.name: Change P1 extra colors
change-p1-extra.description: You can't have just wave trail enabled, it will be overriden by the glow color option (blame robtop not me).

change-p2-extra.name: Change P2 extra colors
change-p2-extra.description: You can't have just wave trail enabled, it will be overriden by the glow color option (blame robtop not me).

color-picker.name: Color Picker
color-picker.description: Select which method to use when getting/picking the colors.

on-black:change-to-screen-picker.name: Change picker when black
on-black:change-to-screen-picker.description: Changes to screen picker when the BG picker returns black [0,0,0], supposing the level has a custom/mid BG.

update-time.name: Update time (ms)
update-time.description: <co>Increase the value if there are too many flashing colors or having fps drops.</c>

render-x-pos.name: Set X
render-x-pos.description: Set where in the X axis pick the colors. <co>0.4 may conflict with player follow picker.</c>

render-y-pos.name: Set Y
render-y-pos.description:
Set where in the Y axis pick the colors
<co>Overriden by Y offset when player follow is enabled.</c>

debug-title.name: Debug
debug-title.description: These should be used for debugging purposes only. This also may cause lag.
